titleEN: 3 FIT Theory The World’s Best T-Shirts
content: T-Shirt sizes are bullsh*t. From tall to small to muscular to “big boned,” 3 FIT Theory has a fit for you. 3 different fits to try on at home. Prepaid return mailer included for the ones you don’t choose. Real men. Real explosions. 3 FIT Theory.

titleEN: Pieces Of The Galaxy Puzzle Challenge
content: Hidden challenges, gorgeous craftsmanship, and uniquely shaped pieces come together in this incredible puzzle collection. Pieces shaped after historical, mythological, and astronomical references make completing these challenging puzzles a delight.

Level up your content by instantly expanding your abilities using the OSBOT movement tracking A.I. camera. The camera acts as your personal cameraman and director and also allows you to track, record and capture movement in 4K.

This interactive touschscreen projector transforms any flat surface into your own personal touchscreen. This WiFi and Bluetooth enabled standalone projector features an ultra-short focusing lens that can project a 100″ screen while being only 20″ from the wall.

These hoodies made from coffee grounds are the incredibly eco-friendly, versatile, and resilient garments perfect for traveling. They offer UV protection and are quick drying, moisture wicking, and even pick-pocket proof.

This mechanical spider Bluetooth speaker delivers crisp sound in a package infinitely more stylish and appealing than a boring old rectangular speaker. This sci-fi-inspired speaker features an nifty alien-like robotic design and has a wireless range of 66 feet.

Change the mood and feel of any room on command with these smart modular light panels. They’re sound reactive, voice reactive, can be interactively controlled by hovering your hand, and are fully modular so you can arrange them in any form that you want.

Introducing HUNT22 – the world’s smallest & toughest Titanium UV flashlight!  Hook it onto your keyring and explore the hidden world with this incredible, lightweight flashlight. This is the coolest everyday, must have product.

Reduce your carbon footprint next time you plan to hit the trails by hopping aboard the Stealth Electric ATV. This all-terrain ride is equipped with a 72-volt 4-kilowatt lithium ion battery that charges in just 6 hours and has a range of 65 miles.

If science and astronomy are your thing, this simulated black hole is just for you! Simply put, Singularity is a simulated black hole that is crafted from a nanotube array that absorbs 99.9% of light in the visible spectrum and beyond!

Snags, runs, and holes will become a thing of the past when you slip into a pair of the world’s toughest pantyhose. They’re made from an incredibly strong polymer, feature a non-slip waistband, and come in 4 colors including 3 shades of true-to-skin-tone nudes.

EnerQi is the invisible wireless charger ideal for using on thick desks and tabletops. This next generation charger conveniently mounts under the surface of your desk or table and can charge your smartphone from up to 40 millimeters away.

Liven up game night with a little dodgeball action courtesy of the Throw Throw Burrito card game. In this wildly fun and past-paced game, players must draw cards to rack up points, set up duels, and even throw soft burritos at each other!

Experience flight like never before by upgrading your drone to MetaFly – the flying controllable biomimetic creature. This high-tech and crash-proof little fella can easily be flown indoors and whiz through the air at speeds of 11-mph using a dedicated remote control.

LIMBO is a smart, self-balancing electric gyro, disguised as a beautiful CNC machined top that spins for hours – even set a Guinness world record for longest spin time for a spinning mechanical top! LIMBO can also spin on surfaces that other tops can’t, like a tomato!

Don’t know if you should give a f*ck or not? Flip this large badass 1oz. heavyweight coin, and let fate decide! “Zero F*cks” on one side, “One F*ck” on the other! Available in 6 colors and has amazing details, like the eagle flipping the bird!

Minimize your carbon footprint by leaving some footprints with the world’s most eco-friendly shoe. These comfy, stylish, and environmentally-conscious kicks are made from recycled cork bison fiber, merino wool, rice rubber, algae foam, and bamboo.

Simply put, the peanut butter pump is the ultimate kitchen appliance for anyone who loves nut butters. The lid fits over most standard jars so that you can quickly and conveniently spread your delicious peanut butter without making a mess.

Tired of hating your life in the middle seat? Tired of losing your stuff in the middle of security checks? The Ultimate Onli Travel system provides a modular 3-part luggage system that combines a world-class backpack with a carry-on, so it always fits!

Make the travelling process less chaotic by upgrading to the Genius Pack smart carry-on. Apart from the sturdy polycarbonate shell, it comes loaded with useful features like 2 external USB ports, a removable airline-approved power pack, and even a handy packing checklist.

Improve your game by ensuring your ball is at the optimal pressure with this self-regulating basketball inflation needle. This revolutionary new needle comes with a self-regulating valve that whistles to inform you when the ball is at just the right pressure.

Make learning a to speak another language a whole lot easier with Lily – the Chinese teaching smart speaker. This 100% voice controlled speaker helps you learn in a more natural way as it converses with you in real time while teaching you correct pronunciation.

Fine tune your timepiece to match your ever-changing look by strapping on a Dango quick release modular watch. Each one of the three models in the collection can be personalized with the lugs, straps, and bracelets of your choice for the ultimate in customization.

Mars X-House is the habitat prototype that SEArch+ and Apis Cor plan to 3D-print in concrete as part of a tech demonstration for NASA’s 3D-Printed Habitat Challenge. The competition is being held to find most suitable 3D-printed habitat for deep space exploration.

The X-Tankcopter is the all-terrain drone that can venture virtually anywhere! Unlike other standard drones on the market, this rugged quadcopter comes with tank-like Kevlar treads that allow it to easily traverse over uneven and rough terrain.

Fully charge your dead laptop in just 1.5 hours by plugging it into the Zendure SuperTank power bank. This 27,000 mAh charger comes with dual USB-A ports, 4 USB outputs, and can recharge completely in just 60 minutes!

Norrland Parka is the first winter coat with over twenty built-in smart features including Wi-Fi, powerbank, gloves and much much more! The Norrland Parka is the coat you’ve always wanted, but never previously existed – and is available in four styles!

Level up your culinary game without having to slave away for hours by having the MasterSous 8-in-1 smart cooker do all the work. It comes with 8 different pre-sets including “deep fry”, “saute”, and “sear” and even lets you remotely stir the pot using your smartphone.

Control your connected devices while maintaining a calming, distraction-free digital environment with the wooden smart home control hub. The display appears over the wooden surface with a swipe of your hand and then disappears once you’re done.

If you enjoy building and tinkering around you’ll love the Sphero programmable all-terrain rover. Driveable right out of the box, this little motorized rover comes fitted with ribbed treads that allow it to easily drive across all types of rough and challenging terrain.

The Matrix PowerWatch is the world’s most powerful smartwatch that you never have to charge! This rugged timepiece features a built-in thermoelectric and solar-cell that power the watch using either your own body heat or solar energy.

Keep your screen positioned at the perfect angle without having to lug around a bulky stand by outfitting your laptop with MOFT – the invisible laptop stand. It sticks onto the bottom of your laptop so that you can easily unfold it at anytime.

OGarden Smart is the smart indoor gardening system that allows you to effortlessly grow farm-fresh produce from the comfort of home. It boasts an automatic watering system and is large enough to grow up to 90 fruits and veggies simultaneously.

Give your fancy footwork some extra appeal by slipping into a pair of these glow LED surface sneakers. This comfy high-quality sneaker is made with cutting-edge fiber optic technology that allows you to alternate between one of six vibrant colors.

Companion is the most advanced two-person emergency survival system on the planet. This adaptable and ultra compact pack comes loaded with everything that you’ll need to sustain yourself and someone else for the first 72 hours of any catastrophe.

When it comes to roadside safety, the Trilight Emergency Car Light is a must-have. This extremely versatile device functions as an electric warning triangle, a car battery jump starter, a power bank, a bike light, a work light, a camp light, and a handy SOS light.

Fully immerse yourself in your favorite videogame like never before by wearing this full body haptic suit. This futuristic styled suit features a state-of-the-art electro-tactile haptic feedback system that lets you touch and feel your virtual surroundings.

Upgrade your everyday carry with the DualFuel stainless steel pocket powerbank. This revolutionary everyday carry gadget combines a compact 1250mAh powerbank charger with a flameless electric coil lighter so you can charge or light up at any time!

Ensure you always get the shot setting up your camera in record time with help form the SwitchPod handheld tripod. The clever design allows you to switch from a handheld mount to a stable little tripod in seconds just by setting it down and releasing your grip.

The Oru Kayak is the two person foldable kayak that will let you explore almost any waterway you come across on your excursion. The kayak can be assembled in just 10 minutes, supports up to 500 pounds, and comes with features like a roomy cockpit and buckle closure system.

Ensure your most frequently used gadgets are always juiced up and in one place by laying them on top of the Gaze multi-device wireless charging tray. This storage tray comes with ample room for all your gear and is also equipped with 2 UBS ports for your wired devices.

Hoverboards and bulky Segways are old news, these Drift W1 Skates from Segway are the hip and incredibly fun new way to get around. These ultra portable splash-proof skates allow for precision steering ideal for crowded places and can travel at speeds up to 7.5 mph.

Minimize the chances of ingesting harmful substances when drinking from an unsafe water source by pouring your water in the GeoPress water purifying water bottle. It removes all waterborne pathogens, filtering chemicals, heavy metals, and even microplastics.

Upgrade your mobile workstation without breaking the bank with the Gemini affordable on-the-go monitor. It boasts a built-in battery, a functional kickstand, and is available in either a 1080p (FHD) resolution or a stunning 4K resolution.

Introducing Sub – the world’s tiniest & toughest aerospace grade Aluminium flashlight that’s resistant to all the elements. Standing at just 1″ tall, this incredible flashlight is a must have everyday carry item for just about everyone on the planet!

Exponentially increase productivity by transforming your desktop into a workshop with Hexbot – the all-in-one desktop robot arm. This versatile robot arm can effortlessly and masterfully perform everything from drawing and laser engraving to 3D printing.

Explore the mysterious world that lies hidden deep under the water’s surface by sending in the Titan deep diving underwater drone. It can be operated remotely, comes with a powerful 4K 30fps camera, and can effortlessly dive down to depths of 492 feet.

With the Space Rocket screwdriver firmly in your grip you’ll be able to effortlessly build, repair, and adjust even the tiniest DIY projects. It’s compatible with standard bits, is expandable, comes with a magnetized tip to hold small screws in place, and can be used single-handedly.

Take control of your back pain at home with The Back Pedal. Designed by a Doctor of Physical Therapy to Realign, Strengthen, and Stabilize your back & pelvis – just ten minutes a day can save you countless trips to the doctor!

With SmartNudge – the automatic toilet lid lowering device – you’ll finally be able quit nagging your significant other to put down the toilet seat after every use. After each use, a small stick automatically extends and gently knocks the toilet seat back down.

Transform any flat surface into your own personal movie theater with PIQO – the world’s most powerful pocket projector. Weighing less than 8 ounces, this ultra light projector comes with an on-board speaker and delivers an crisp image that remains sharp at up to 240″ away.

Keep your life protected from hackers with this protective smartphone case. Apart from providing superior protection, this smartphone case prevents volume eavesdropping in addition to camera hacking, all in one sleek design.

Empower and educate while you entertain by sitting down for a rousing game of Extraordinary Women Guess Who. This modern take on the classic game replaces all the zany characters with actual icons like Frida Kahlo, Harriet Tubman, and Amelia Earhart

Trump all other blankets on the market by snuggling up with the biggest blanket ever. This massive machine washable blanket measures 10′ x 10′ and is made from a lush and incredibly soft temperature regulating material that stretches and wicks moisture.

Say goodbye to damp and stinky towels once and for all by upgrading to Kanso – the self cleaning towel! This revolutionary towel combines anti-microbial bamboo fibers and a bold waffle weave design so the towel dries ultra fast and doesn’t need to be washed as often.

titleEN: Hyperdrive USB-C Hub For iPad Pro
content: Easily upgrade your tablet’s functionality with this hyperdrive USB-C hub for the iPad Pro. Specifically designed for the 2018 iPad Pro, this handy plug and play attachment allows you to simultaneously connect an HDMI, USB-C, microSD, USB-A and a 3.5mm audio.

titleEN: The Growing Modular Bike For Kids
content: The growing modular bike for kids is the revolutionary 8-in-1 ride that adapts to your growing child. The ingenious design of the Monkeycycle allows you to convert it from a sturdy stroller all the way up to a two-wheeled pedal bike.

Upgrade your riding gear with the Jarvish smart motorcycle helmet! This high-tech Alexa enabled helmet allows you to enhance your ride with features like active noise cancellation, a voice activated heads-up display, and front and rear mounted cameras.

Ensure you’re always prepared for the worst by keeping an ace up your sleeve with this survival credit card axe multi-tool. Crafted from durable titanium, this ultra portable accessory comes fitted with 24 useful tools that include an arrow head, a tomahawk, and a can opener.

Cut down your electrical costs by equipping your house with this DIY home solar power system. It installs in minutes and enables you to collect and store generated energy unrestricted behind your meter where your local utility company has no involvement.

Stay dry and warm when encountering cold and adverse conditions by suiting up with the world’s most advanced adventure jacket. This ultralight water-resistant and windproof garment features a comfy athletic fit and a high neck and insulated hood for added warmth.

The PWR27 portable power station is the ultimate solution to all your charging needs. This A/C powerbank is equipped with a massive 27,000 mAh battery capable of charging up to 5 devices simultaneously and features an incredibly sturdy waterproof and dustproof casing.

titleEN: The World’s Thinnest Smart Pen Phone
content: The Zanco S Pen is the world’s thinnest smart pen phone. Despite its ultra compact and portable design, it comes loaded with all the essentials like a voice recorder, Bluetooth capabilities, an onboard speaker, stylus pen, and dual cameras.

Avoid sleeping in a cesspool of germs when you’re forced to sleep on questionable hotel beds by letting the bacteria killing robot loose in the sheets. It boasts 8 A.I. sensors in addition to 4 UV-C lamps that will kill 99.99% of germs and bacteria living in the sheets and blankets.

ManualPen is a pen that you could bring to the Moon. It is machined out of a single piece of metal without any parts that could ever break. The pen writes in zero gravity, underwater, and even upside down!

Kick your fiesta into high gear by busting out the ultimate shot glass party kit. The set includes eight shot glasses, two glass gun shaped decanters and a dual holster – all snuggly fitted into a protective briefcase so that you can bring the party virtually anywhere.

Capture amazing shots of your life from any angle by placing the Hover2 self-flying drone on the job. It boasts an omni-follow feature that keeps you inside the frame no matter what angle, resulting in incredible professional grade footage.

The Vessi waterproof breathable knit shoe is the lightweight and ultra comfortable sneaker that’s perfect for any season. These rugged and versatile sneakers feature a unique construction that will keep out sand and water so that your socks are always nice and dry.

This electric go-kart from Segway Ninebot will turn any flat slab of concrete into your own personal playground. This all-ages drifting machine features an adjustable frame that caters to a variety or rider sizes and can accelerate from 0 to 12 miles per hour in just 2 seconds!

Maximize productivity when you’re working on-the-go by attaching this split touch screen monitor to your trusty laptop. This 15.6″ 1080p touchscreen is compatible with both PC and Apple devices and can even connect to your smartphone, making it ideal for gaming.

The revolutionary Trazor all-in-one shaving system lets you use what ever blade you want for what ever you want to shave. No more hassles, no more buying multiple razors. It’s one and done with Trazor!

With the Igloohome smart padlock you’ll be able to grant access to any user no matter where you are. It combines the usefulness of PIN locks with the versatility of Bluetooth locks so that you can easily send PIN codes via SMS or other texting apps to any user.

titleEN: Naval Mine Stainless Steel Ice Cube
content: Make a splash at your next soiree by giving your drinks some nautical flair with these naval mine stainless steel ice cubes. They’re designed like WWII era contact naval mines and are crafted from stainless steel so that they won’t water down your drink.

Place a stylish spin on the way you tell time by hanging the Solstice kinetic clock on your wall. It gradually changes shape throughout the day – opening and closing like a flower and turning the passage of time into moving art.

Make your time of the month a little more bearable by eliminating pain and discomfort with the Silk’n Stop period pain relief device. It penetrates deep into the muscles to help increase the oxygen and nutrients supplied to the uterus muscle cells for lasting pain relief.

Enjoy the perks of having a lovely little garden without having to put in any of the work by leaving it all up to Plantone – the smart mini indoor garden. With this handy garden you’ll be able to grow up to five different plant species at once – with adjusted watering for each one.

When it comes to travel-day outfits, you won’t find a better option than the inflatable travel jumpsuit. This comfy jumpsuit comes loaded with a slew of features ranging from an inflatable hood and neck pillow to ample storage pockets and even a zippered butt flap.
KRUVE EQ glassware is scientifically designed to amplify or soften certain flavor notes – just like an audio equalizer and put you in control of your sensory experience!
